title: BOAT & SHIP BUILDING ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

title: ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
utme_requirements:
Applicants Must possess a Senior Secondary School Certificate or its equivalent with at least FIVE CREDIT passes in subjects which must include:
- Mathematics 
- English Language,
- Physics,
- Chemistry, 
- and any other related Science subjects obtained within the last Five years in NOT MORE THAN TWO SITTINGS

title: MARINE ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY

- and any other related Science subjects obtained within the last Five years in NOT MORE THAN TWO SITTINGS

title: MARINE TRANSPORT & BUSINESS STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Applicants Must possess a Senior Secondary School Certificate or its equivalent with at least FIVE CREDIT passes in subjects which must include:
- Mathematics,
- English Language,
- Economics,

- Geography/Commerce.
- and any of Geography, Commerce, Government, Financial Accounting and Business Management obtained within the last Five years in NOT MORE THAN TWO SITTINGS.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce, Government, Principles of Accounts

title: NAUTICAL SCIENCE

- Geography,
- and any other related Science subjects obtained within the last Five years in NOT MORE THAN TWO SITTINGS.
